title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 63.5 - General provisions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 63.5 - General provisions

State Regulations

The general provisions of the Environmental Conservation

Law are applicable to hunting, trapping, fishing, dog training and field trials
pursuant to this Part, including the provisions of section 11-0931 prohibiting
the discharge of firearms within 500 feet of an occupied
building. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
63.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
